post:
Mediafire gives you three options:

 1. Free account 10GB (up to 50GB)
 
 2. Pro account 1TB for $2.49 OR $24.99/year
 
 3. Business account upto 100TB

Signup with my refer link: [Here](https://www.mediafire.com/upgrade/?r=0e603dv) (to let me earn some free space ;))

signup link(Without my refer :( ): [Here](https://www.mediafire.com/upgrade/)

Edit:Installing Desktop app and Mobile app gives you extra 4GB for free
